programme.title: Escape From Mogadishu
programme.desc: The ambassadors from North and South Korea in Somalia must join hands to escape from war-torn Somalia.

programme.title: Kingmaker
programme.desc: A politician met a talented campaign strategist who helped him in becoming the strongest presidential election candidate. Yet conflicts deepen as the he disagrees with the latter on his ideologies.

programme.title: Good Deal
programme.desc: The stories of worn goods that build bridges between people from all walks of life begin with a little boy trying to buy a second-hand baseball jacket from a former baseball player.

programme.title: Swing Kids
programme.desc: The story of a North Korean soldier who joined the tap dancing team "Swing Kids" in the Geoje prison camp during the Korean War.

programme.title: The Roundup
programme.desc: 4 years after the events of Garibong district round up operation, Geumcheon Police’s Major Crimes Unit is given a mission to repatriate a fugitive who fled to Vietnam.

programme.title: Spiritwalker
programme.desc: A man loses memory and wakes up in a new body every 12 hours. In search of his identity, he met a woman who claims to know him.

programme.title: The Berlin File
programme.desc: A North Korean agent in Berlin is betrayed and cut loose when a weapons deal is exposed. He tries to escape being purged, while being pursued by a North and South Korean operative.

programme.title: The President'S Barber
programme.desc: A man and his family get tangled in decades of political chaos when he was appointed as the president's personal barber.

programme.title: The Prison
programme.desc: A former detective enters a prison as a convict in order to meet a man who is known as The King among the inmates so he can reveal the truth about his brother's death.

programme.title: Samjin Company English Class
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in South Korea, three female office co-workers who enroll in English classes in hopes to advance their careers, struggle to expose the corruption inside their company.

programme.title: Going By The Book
programme.desc: Things get out of control when an eager traffic cop who tends to do things by the book was chosen to act as a bank robber in a drill.

programme.title: Queen Of Walking
programme.desc: A high school girl who has to walk for four hours to school everyday unexpectedly discovers her talent for walking and begins training as a speed walking athlete.

programme.title: Master
programme.desc: An intellectual crime investigation team goes after One Network, a company involved in a massive fraud and corruption case in Korea.

programme.title: Spiritwalker
programme.desc: A man loses memory and wakes up in a new body every 12 hours. In search of his identity, he met a woman who claims to know him.

programme.title: Kim Ji Young, Born 1982
programme.desc: Kim Ji-young, an ordinary Korean woman in her 30s, suddenly shows signs of being inhabited by her late mother and older sister after she becomes a stay-at-home mother.

programme.title: The President'S Barber
programme.desc: A man and his family get tangled in decades of political chaos when he was appointed as the president's personal barber.

programme.title: Take Point
programme.desc: An elite mercenary force get caught on a CIA mission which sparks fear of an impending World War III.

programme.title: I Am Father
programme.desc: This movie is about a corrupt detective and a father who is falsely charged with murder. The chase begins when the father clears himself of the false accusation and plots his revenge on the detective.

programme.title: Good Deal
programme.desc: The stories of worn goods that build bridges between people from all walks of life begin with a little boy trying to buy a second-hand baseball jacket from a former baseball player.

programme.title: We Are Brothers
programme.desc: Two brothers separated at birth reunite 30 years later and go on a road trip in search of their mom with Alzheimer's.

programme.title: Okay! Madam
programme.desc: A married couple unwittingly become involved in a rescue operation of a hijacked aircraft during their first-ever family trip abroad to Hawaii.

programme.title: The Gangster, The Cop, The Devil
programme.desc: After barely surviving a violent attack by an elusive serial killer, a crime boss finds himself forming an unlikely partnership with a local detective to catch the sadistic killer.

programme.title: Lover'S Concerto
programme.desc: Anonymous love letters keep coming to Ji-hwan, refreshing his memories 5 years ago of two long-lost best friends, but when love rushed in, who will be left behind?

programme.title: The Age Of Blood
programme.desc: The once best swordsman in Joseon, Kim Ho, was demoted as a prison guard after a lost battle and fought with a rebel force that snuck into the jail to save their captured leader.

programme.title: Operation Chromite
programme.desc: "Operation Chromite" tells the true story of a General, who led the attack against the North Koreans in the Battle of Incheon, forcing them to retreat out of Seoul.

programme.title: A Day
programme.desc: A man commits an unethical act in an attempt to save his daughter's life. Three years later, his actions return to haunt him.

programme.title: Queen Of Walking
programme.desc: A high school girl who has to walk for four hours to school everyday unexpectedly discovers her talent for walking and begins training as a speed walking athlete.

programme.title: Escape From Mogadishu

programme.title: The Prison
programme.desc: A former detective enters a prison as a convict in order to meet a man who is known as The King among the inmates so he can reveal the truth about his brother's death.

programme.title: Secret Reunion
programme.desc: A NIS agent is discharged after failing to stop the murder of a N. Korean dissident. Years later, he bumps into the N. Korean spy who was involved in the mission and quickly forms a bond.

programme.title: Voice Of A Murderer
programme.desc: The only son of a news anchor disappears without a trace. There is a veteran cop and his special task force assigned to this case, but there is an indication the kidnapper is aware of their presence.

programme.title: We Don't Bite: Villains in the Countryside Ep11
programme.desc: The 3 ‘villains’ from <Penthouse> will have a special holiday in an empty house. They’ll furnish the house to create their own hideout. Guests will join them and enjoy a healing time together.

programme.title: BOYS PLANET Ep6
programme.desc: As a K-pop boy group audition project decided and produced only by Korean and global fans, <BOYS PLANET> presents the potential of boys from all around the world.

programme.desc: Baek Jong-won will transform into a catering chef with Ahn Bo-hyun, Oh Dae-hwan, and DinDin! Arriving only with backpacks, they have to prepare a large amount of customized food within limited time.

programme.title: Let’s Go Crazy on LIVE!(M) Ep1617
programme.desc: As an ordinary girl, working an ordinary job, at an ordinary convenience store, Lin An An had only one dream in life: to find a good, stable, government job so she could support her aging grandfather. With that single dream in mind, An An never even thought of becoming anything more than the ordinary girl she had always been. But all that changed the day You Yuan Le walked into her life.

programme.title: Way to Health(M) Ep189190
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about one’s health.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep45
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3363
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45734574
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep993994
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1795
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Monday (M) Ep386

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2010
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Moving Kitchen (M) Ep386
programme.desc: Tuesday "iWalker" has been upgraded and changed the name into "iWalker-Moving Kitchen". James and the pretty chef, Rachel will move to different province with the mobile kitchen which costs more than 2 million NTD, and introduce to the audience the unique taste of the province.

programme.title: Legend of the Demon Cat
programme.desc: Adapted from a Japanese fantasy novel, a demon cat appears and breaks the peace of Chang'an city, causing a series of mysterious events. A poet and a Japanese monk band together to follow the trails left by the cat, leading them to discover a buried secret.

programme.title: Kung Fu Jungle
programme.desc: A vicious killer goes around challenging and killing top refined martial arts masters. When convicted killer and kung fu expert Hahou Mo hears of this, he offers to help the police capture the killer in exchange for his freedom. Can he really help?

programme.title: The Empty Hands
programme.desc: Mari Hirakawa inherits her father’s dojo after his death but wants to sell it as she does not want to run the karate practice. For her plan to succeed, she has to take on a bet with his father’s ex-student and compete in a martial arts competition that will change her life.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kong’s legendary detective?

programme.title: I Love You, You're Perfect, Now Change!
programme.desc: Catch this comedy-musical adapted from the Broadway classic I LOVE YOU, YOU’RE PERFECT, NOW CHANGE – consisting of 12 independent stories from the viewpoints of individuals, families and societies all exploring the timeless theme of love!

programme.title: The Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: Pu Song Ling, a legendary demon hunter, is asked to investigate a case involving missing teenage village girls with disciple, Constable Yan Fei. The duo leads a group of little monsters to help with the investigation, and in their search for the truth, they accidentally discover a mysterious love between a knight and a female ghost.

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when De’s eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: Running Out Of Time
programme.desc: When a cancer-ridden criminal sets out to seek vengeance on Hong Kong's organized crime syndicates, police inspector and excellent hostage negotiator Ho Sheung Sang finds himself pulled into a 72-hour battle of wits and courage.

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face life’s mounting hardships.

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderella’s adventure has just begun!

programme.title: Operation Red Sea
programme.desc: When a terrorist group plots to obtain nuclear materials under the cover of a violent coup in Northern Africa, only the Chinese Navy’s elite, Jiaolong Assault Team, have the deadly skill and precision needed to take on the situation and rescue its citizens.

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves “The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real “Chosen Sleuth” instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Deception of the Novelist
programme.desc: This is a sexy thriller adapted from the hit story by the famous internet author, Xxharuki. A self-help book author Xu lives happily with his wife Jeana and their son. However, when a voluptuous and seductive tenant rents their apartment upstairs, Xu’s life is turned upside down.

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when De’s eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: MMA Diva
programme.desc: Xin Lan takes over her father’s MMA club which is heavily in debt due to poor business. After He Hua defeated Xin Lan, she replaces her to become the new top MMA Diva and challenges Xin Lan’s MMA club to a duel. As Xin Lan is injured, she seeks help from a retried MMA superstar to fight the battle on her behalf to reclaim the club’s and her honour.

programme.title: Office
programme.desc: Lee Seung is a hopeful and idealistic new hire at a billion-dollar company. However, he soon finds that this new world is more complicated than he thought, with a myriad of illicit relationships, including one between the company chairman and the CEO, and the cutthroat world of finance laid bare before his eyes as the company prepares to go public.

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the façade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kong’s elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: A group of former mercenaries reunite to plan an epic heist: boosting a truckload of medicine held by a foreign intelligence agency to supply a refugee camp in need. When they find the truck is filled with stolen gold however, they realize they have been double-crossed by one of their own and putting the situation right will be an all-out war.

programme.title: The Tag-Along: Devil Fish
programme.desc: When a man caught a fish from the lake and grilled it to eat, he heard a weird voice and saw a strange human face on the fish. Weird incidents occurred one after another, before a temple priest exorcises the malicious spirits brought on by the caught fish.

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Mr Lin and Miss Wang are the two top bounty hunters in the business, and are searching for the destructive missile “Hand of God” to prove who is the better bounty hunter. They soon realize they are not the only ones after the missile. Will Lin and Wang put their differences aside and work together in search for the ‘Hand of God’?

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asia’s top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Triad
programme.desc: This is a story about the Hong Kong Triads. Ting (William Chan). Cheung (Derek Tsang) and Dong (Edward Chui) are childhood friends who join a Triad together. After joining however, they discover that fame and fortune will ultimately break them apart as only one of them can become the leader of the gang.

Chow Mo Wan encounters many women in his life but is touched by none after he lost his true love. Following an encounter one day, he decides to write a fiction titled “2046” which takes place at Room 2046. Nothing ever changes at Room 2046, and people go there to find their lost memories.

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: Secret Diary of a Mom To Be, The
programme.desc: A high-flying PR manager and her loving husband swear by a childless lifestyle but she is shocked to learn that she is expecting just when things look bright for a promotion! How would they deal with the unexpected surprises that life throws in their way?

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb…

programme.title: The 14 Amazons
programme.desc: The Yang family had served their country in Song Dynasty for generations. When General Yang is ambushed and killed during the war in Jin Shan, the grand matriarch led the entire family to take revenge and defend the country.

programme.title: The Story Of Sue San
programme.desc: TIn this Huangmei Opera romance, Wang is the son of a respected government official whereas Sue San is a famous prostitute. Although they love each other and seem to be perfectly matched, the two are worlds apart when it comes to social ranking, which will prove hard to overcome...

programme.title: A Taste Of Cold Steel
programme.desc: It's a no-holds-barred battle to the death for possession of the invaluable Purple Sword. Assistant director Wang Po-yi also wrote this entertaining and exciting adventure which could have also been called "The Five Tigers" since there's no doubt that this quintet is the highlight of the action. Huang Tsung-shun is "Fierce Tiger," Hung Liu is "Drunk Tiger," Hsu Erh-niu is "Lame Tiger," award-winning actor Ku Feng is "One-eyed Tiger" and respected director/actor Wu Ma is "Sick Tiger" in a tangle of tussles and thrills.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: The Savage Five
programme.desc: A group of bandits flees with a stolen safe to a village where they oppress the villagers and force the blacksmith Wei to unlock the safe. Wei refuses and flees to report to officials, while heroes of the town emerge to fight the bandits.

programme.title: My Name Ain'T Suzie
programme.desc: Patricia Ha stars with Deanie Ip in her most famous and audacious role as a young woman rising to fame as a popular bargirl in this local answer to Hollywood's The World of Suzie Wong.

programme.title: Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A Wu Dang disciple Fu, kills the chief of Wu Dang Clan and frames it on the chief’s illegitimate child, Yun. Fu then proclaims himself the new chief and orders the killing of Yun, who vows to avenge his father’s death and learns the invincible silkworm martial arts style in order to defeat Fu.

programme.title: The Land Of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women give birth to baby girls by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: King Eagle
programme.desc: A young swordman, King Eagle, unwillingly gets involved in the internal affairs of a powerful clan and becomes their target. He is saved by the female chief of the clan, Lin, and falls in love with her. However, Lin’s sister is part of all evil plots and betrays her. Even so, Lin begs King Eagle not to harm her sister.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xu’s until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all the disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone in the temple except five Shaolin disciples. To take revenge on the Qing’s, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become “The Five Shaolin Masters”.

programme.title: Twelve Deadly Coins
programme.desc: When Qiao Miao is about to kill the bandit whom he just met, he is attracted by her beauty and they quickly fall in love. The two later discover the blood feud between the owner of the unique weapon - “Twelve Deadly Coins” and the old master who controls the bandit...

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: One of the most far-out, fantastical films ever made in Chinese movie history, this pays tribute to the Japanese superhero trend in the 1970s. It tells the story of the thunderbolt-fisted Inframan, who is transformed from a young lab researcher to a superhero battling the crazy and ambitious monsters of the ice age.

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: The Gambling Syndicate
programme.desc: A young provincial detective seeks to take down a local gambling syndicate with the help of two convicts.

programme.title: A Friend From Inner Space
programme.desc: A young boy whose parents are separated tries to find happiness in life. One day, he meets and befriends a kind-hearted spirit Ren, who decides to make him truly happy by getting his parents back together.

programme.title: Return To The 36Th Chamber
programme.desc: The second film of the trilogy, Gordon Liu plays Zhou Ren Jie, a man who impersonates a monk in order to learn kung fu in Shaolin, and eventually creates his own Shaolin style of ‘scaffolding kung fu”.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperor’s sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Mongolian emperor Kublai Khan is being assassinated while meeting with the Italian explorer Marco Polo. Marco Polo is appointed to lead the troops for the emperor to wipe out the anti-Mongol rebels. Yet, he is touched by these rebels who are resisting the Mongolian invasion of their homeland. Will Marco Polo stay loyal to the emperor?

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Challenge Of The Masters
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung must prove himself worthy to be taught by Master Lu, the same martial arts teacher of his father. Although he is defeated in the competition, Wong Fei Hung’s passion in Kung Fu finally allows him to become Lu’s disciple.

programme.title: Return Of The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: Vengeance Is A Golden Blade
programme.desc: Convoy Master Li’s wife has an affair with his rival Long, who plans to steal Li’s Golden Blade and kill him as well as his young daughter. Li and his daughter manage to escape and the latter grows up to be a skilled swordswoman who vows to avenge her mother’s death – a lie told by Li. The truth is revealed when she sees her mother alive by chance.

programme.title: Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities
programme.desc: Li Han-hsiang wrote and directed this charming and fascinating comedy, Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities. The two cities in the picture are Macau, where a love quartet is a morally-unsound source for sexual entertainment; and Hong Kong, where a woman enters a gambler’s apartment to find four shackles hanging from his ceiling to aid in kinky activities.

programme.title: The Weird Man
programme.desc: During the Three Kingdoms period, a Taoist priest Yu Ji cures many patients with his supernatural powers and is loved by the people. However, the arrogant general Sun Che thinks that Yu Ji bewitches people and orders for him to be beheaded. Subsequently, the spirit of the Yu Ji rises from his dead body and takes revenge on Sun Che.

programme.title: The Golden Lion
programme.desc: The Golden Lion is a bandit with good martial arts skills and often robs from the rich to help the poor. He is ambushed and attacked by a gang one night but luckily found help from a master healer, who has to find a way to treat him while they are both being chased by the gang.

programme.title: Legend Of The Bat
programme.desc: It is rumoured that people can buy anything they desire on the mysterious Island of Bats so long as they have money. The charismatic swordsman Chu Liu Xiang and his friend travel to the island to seek answers but realize they are not the only ones who want to unveil the mystery of this place.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Li Ching plays, Ah Chiao, a girl from a rural village stranded in the city, who befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are all poor, but Ah Chiao’s fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she ultimately learns money can't buy happiness.

programme.title: Killer Clans
programme.desc: This colourful, complex saga is packed with conspiracies, schemes and sword fights to produce a perfect blend of great action and gripping drama. The movie centres on the struggle for underworld supremacy between the Longmen and Roc clans, where the line between good and evil is not always that clear-cut or obvious.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, however, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf for winning the lantern contest. At the same time, Zhao plans for revenge. One day, after Long’s wife suddenly disappeared, Long hears about the story of human lantern, leading him to suspect Zhao may involve in the incident…

programme.title: The Swordmates
programme.desc: Li asks his swordmate Wang to protect his family while he is away, but Wang rapes his wife and even has his convoy attacked. Li escaped but fears his daughter is still in danger, so he asks the nephew of his master to help protect her…

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey (Yueh Hua) and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan (Pat Ting Hung), Madam White Bone (Cheng Pei Pei) and her sexy sister (Lily Ho), and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: Gambler'S Delight
programme.desc: The Killer star Danny Lee plays the lead role of a guy who needs to become a hero. He lies, steals and cheats his way into operating a plush casino, but when he incurs the wrath of a female Japanese gang leader, all bets are off!

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Li’s new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: Chinatown Kid
programme.desc: After getting into trouble with a local gangster, Chui Ho, a young man, Tam Dong flees to San Francisco and managed to get a job in a restaurant in Chinatown. Tam Dong finds himself embroiled with the gang again while in San Francisco, and has to fight Chui Ho when the two meet again...

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: The Wolf of Wall Street's Jonah Hill and Whiplash's Miles Teller star in this dramedy based on a true story that follows two twenty-something Miami stoners who exploit a little-known government initiative during the Iraq War that allows small businesses to bid on U.S. Military contracts. Starting small, they begin raking in big money and are soon living the high life. But the pair gets in over their heads when they land a $300 million deal to arm the Afghan Military -- a deal that puts them in business with some very shady people, not the least of which turns out to be the U.S. Government. Comedy powerhouse Todd Phillips (The Hangover films) writes, directs and produces (with Bradley Cooper) this incredible true story based on a controversial Rolling Stone article.

programme.desc: Hilarious comedy of a tough, hard-hitting Detroit street cop who takes matters into his own hands when a murder investigation takes him to the ultra-chic community of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: Sequel to the blockbuster hit, the smart-talking Detroit cop shows the Beverly Hills force how to run business in an attempt to save his friend from an unjust dismissal.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: In this wild action adventure, Axel Foley discovers that mobsters are using a theme park as a front for their money-counterfeiting operation, and defeats the evil scheme while turning the park upside down.

programme.title: Life Below Zero (S10) Ep5
programme.desc: A Storm to Remember - Our Alaskans face various emotional challenges as they push through a dark winter.

programme.title: Earth's Tropical Islands (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Madagascar - Journey across Madagascar, the oldest island on Earth. Over time, it has given rise to more unique plants and animals - from its famed lemurs to colourful chameleons - than any other island.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: The Mountain in the Beautiful Valley - The Reykjanes peninsula in Iceland hasn't seen any volcanic activity for over 1000 years, until now. For a whole year the fishing village of Grindavik is rocked by huge earthquakes. One fateful evening the sky glows red; a hill erupts with a deluge of lava. Fagradasfjall volcano is born; five months later, the volcano shows no sign of stopping.

programme.title: Animals with Cameras (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: Oceans - Wildlife cameraman, Gordon Buchanan leads a team using specially designed on board cameras to film ground-breaking new behaviour in some of the animals who depend on our oceans.

programme.title: Frozen Planet II (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: Frozen Worlds - From the Poles to the highest mountain peaks, there are surprising frozen worlds found on every continent - home to unique and remarkable animals.

programme.title: Simon Reeve's South America (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Simon travels from the ancient city of Machu Picchu in Peru to La Paz in Bolivia, the highest capital city on Earth, visiting cocaine farms and gold mines along the way.

programme.title: Tribal Bootcamp (S2) Ep6
programme.desc: New Zealand - Joel and Nish join a gang of sheep shearers in New Zealand. It's the ultimate work hard play hard lifestyle but can the boys handle both the jobs and the alcohol?

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Bigness - Griff Rhys Jones starts his Canadian journey in Newfoundland where he goes looking for moose, discovers the iron ore mining history, shoots St John's time gun and samples both traditional food and a traditional kitchen party.

programme.desc: Kyrgyzstan - Steve and the team head to remotest Kyrgyzstan in search of snow leopards - if the team can find evidence of the endangered big cat, they could protect the region.

programme.title: Inside the Factory (S6) Ep4
programme.desc: Denby (Mugs) - Gregg Wallace visits the Denby factory in Derbyshire, which has been making pottery since 1809. The British drink a staggering 195 million mugs of tea and coffee every day, so Gregg is following production of one of the factory's best sellers, the Halo Heritage mug.

programme.title: Extreme Treks (S3) Ep6
programme.desc: Bolivia - The Choro Trek - The El Choro Trail starts in the lowland jungles of western Bolivia and finishes on the vast Alti-plano plateau that covers much of the country. The journey tracks a historical trading route used by locals for centuries.

programme.title: Inside the Factory (S6) Ep5
programme.desc: Chairs - Gregg Wallace and the team look inside a furniture factory making chair, following it from carving wood to making the finish product.

programme.title: Cheetah Family & Me (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: We follow Savannah and her four cubs in the Tswalu Kalahari Reserve, and Chili and her five kittens in the Great Karoo Wilderness - as they navigate a harsh environment, dangerous wildlife and dwindling prey.

programme.title: Simon Reeve's South America (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Simon travels from the vast white salt flats of Bolivia, through the world's greatest wetlands of Brazil's Pantanal and on to the forested heart of Paraguay.

programme.title: Life Below Zero (S10) Ep6
programme.desc: Into the Freeze - Alaskans seek out vital resources amid a deep freeze in the heart of Dark Winter, pushing through temperatures well below zero.

programme.title: Robson Green: Extreme Fisherman (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: Borneo - Borneo is rich with diverse and strange wildlife, including a sea monster Robson is hunting - a monster that can disappear.

programme.title: Inside the Factory (S6) Ep6
programme.desc: Maltloaf - Gregg Wallace sees how maltloaf is produced on a mass-scale.

programme.title: Animals with Cameras (S2) Ep2
programme.desc: Australia - Wildlife cameraman, Gordon Buchanan leads a team using specially designed on board cameras to film ground-breaking new behaviour in some of Australia's most iconic creatures.

programme.title: Extreme Treks (S3) Ep7
programme.desc: Jordan - The Wadi Rum Desert - With its mountains rising up out of the sand, any journey through the Wadi Rum will leave you feeling you've traveled to another world. Join Ryan as he explores Amman and makes the arduous trek through the unforgiving Wadi Rum Desert.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle (S9) Ep2
programme.desc: Ireland - Ben ventures to the 'Emerald Isle' to visit Georg and Bettina, an elderly couple from Austria and Germany who made the Irish wilderness their home nearly 40 years ago.

programme.title: Robson Green: Extreme Fisherman (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: Guatemala - Robson Green travels to Guatemala in Central America to fish for one of the fastest fish on planet Earth.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - The Big Ones Ep8
programme.desc: Learn why bigger is definitely better for these alphas. Go ringside for a gorilla wrestling match, stay away from pushy moose antlers, steer clear of long pelican bills that snap at any enemy within range, and marvel at a megashark’s stereo sniffer.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Power Ep9
programme.desc: Power-up with alphas who use might to subdue enemies. Marvel when sea lions throw their weight around to win a mate, Cape buffalo deliver knockout punches, Canada geese hit hard with their wings, and lionesses rule the savannah with an iron paw.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Ugly Ep10
programme.desc: Confront alphas with faces only a mother could love. Inspect warthogs’ lumpy armour, giant African bullfrogs’ outsized jumping and biting skills, wild turkeys’ sharp beaks and razorlike spurs, and Nile crocodiles’ crushingly powerful jaws.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Loners Ep11
programme.desc: Sidle up to lone wolf alphas who’d rather go solo. Take a glacial stroll alongside a Galápagos tortoise; dance with venomous European adders; watch a face-tearing battle between Lacerta lizards; and gasp at leopard seals’ amazing stealth attacks.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Chatty/Communicative Ep12
programme.desc: Connect with Earth’s most talkative species. Meet capuchin monkeys, who definitely don’t take a vow of silence; endure Eurasian river otters’ chilling screams; face angry fruit bats’ loud complaints; and explore orcas’ human-scale speech systems.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Invasion Begins Ep1
programme.desc: When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell. But they quickly realize that it will not be a happy encounter.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Bear Ep1
programme.desc: Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Stork Pack in Trouble Ep3
programme.desc: Agonize over a lost Stork pack puppy, and tussle with Manzi pups who are sorting their place in the hierarchy, figuring out noisy-neighbor friends and foes. Hop on a search mission with Julz for the missing Kakuli pack in the desolate Badlands.

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 - The Big Bend Ep2
programme.desc: The Big Bend is over two miles long… one of the biggest meanders along the Luangwa River in Zambia. It’s a busy spot - home to a pod of hippos who luxuriate in its deep pools, an important crossing point for elephants and place to drink for huge herds of buffalo.

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 - Ebony Plain Ep3
programme.desc: Bustling with wildlife, a grassland lies at the heart of Zambia’s Luangwa Valley known to locals as "The Ebony Plain". It’s a busy little neighborhood - home to a family of warthogs, a troop of baboons and a solitary female leopard named Olimba. Watch as life and death unfold on a daily basis in this corner of the Zambian wilds.

programme.title: Baboons: Rules of the Troop
programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species - the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band - to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Colors & Patterns Ep7
programme.desc: Get a front-row seat to nature’s most spectacular fashion show. Admire the luxuriant blond manes of golden snub-nose monkeys, stunning pink flamingo feathers brought on by an all-crustacean diet, and the meaningful markings of gemsboks and cheetahs.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - The Big Ones Ep8
programme.desc: Learn why bigger is definitely better for these alphas. Go ringside for a gorilla wrestling match, stay away from pushy moose antlers, steer clear of long pelican bills that snap at any enemy within range, and marvel at a megashark’s stereo sniffer.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Power Ep9
programme.desc: Power-up with alphas who use might to subdue enemies. Marvel when sea lions throw their weight around to win a mate, Cape buffalo deliver knockout punches, Canada geese hit hard with their wings, and lionesses rule the savannah with an iron paw.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Chatty/Communicative Ep12
programme.desc: Connect with Earth’s most talkative species. Meet capuchin monkeys, who definitely don’t take a vow of silence; endure Eurasian river otters’ chilling screams; face angry fruit bats’ loud complaints; and explore orcas’ human-scale speech systems.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Invasion Begins Ep1
programme.desc: When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell. But they quickly realize that it will not be a happy encounter.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Strength in Sisterhood Ep2
programme.desc: The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomad’s brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 - A Mother's Tale Ep1
programme.desc: The jungle of Sri Lanka is a monkey’s paradise. But not everyone here is equal. Anna sits at the bottom of the social ladder. And with a newborn baby, life is getting tougher. As drought grips the region tensions boil over. Anna is a devoted mother. But can she do enough to keep her son alive?

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Big Cats, Big Trouble Ep4
programme.desc: Dodge a leopard with the Manzi dogs while they treat themselves to a stolen feast. No such luck for the Kakuli pack on the hunt, as they’re foiled by a brave puku antelope. Find the stork pack, and retreat from charging elephants with Jules and Simon.

programme.title: Baboons: Rules of the Troop
programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species - the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band - to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.

programme.desc: Connect with Earth’s most talkative species. Meet capuchin monkeys, who definitely don’t take a vow of silence; endure Eurasian river otters’ chilling screams; face angry fruit bats’ loud complaints; and explore orcas’ human-scale speech systems.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Invasion Begins Ep1
programme.desc: When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell. But they quickly realize that it will not be a happy encounter.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Strength in Sisterhood Ep2
programme.desc: The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomad’s brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - The Lost Boy Ep5
programme.desc: Film a wild dog hunt with Julz as he catches up with the Manzi pack at a kill, and watch for leopards and hyenas as the Kakuli pack takes great risks while waiting for the rains to come. Go on an epic hunt with a returning male of the Stork Colony.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Here Comes the Rain Ep6
programme.desc: Welcome the rains as an emotional Julz says farewell to the dog packs. He discovers the Stork Colony pups hunting guinea fowl, and is heartened to find the Kakuli pups feeding on an antelope carcass. The playful Manzi pack corner a tough warthog.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Cradle of Mankind Ep5
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Family Ep1
programme.desc: Every empire needs a succession plan. Making babies – and raising them – is crucial for every species to survive. In some social circles, it takes a village to raise a family. In others, a single parent is all that stands between the vulnerability of youth and the threats of the wild.

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 - Life's Lessons Ep2
programme.desc: If young animals survive until adulthood, the chances for survival are greatly increased - but many challenges face them before they can strike out on their own. Some have months to grow-up; other have decades – but all, have lots to learn along the way. From getting to grips with their bodies and learning to feed themselves, to practicing fighting skills and learning how to form friendships. There are many hurdles along the way, but every small success could mean the difference between life and death.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Colors & Patterns Ep7
programme.desc: Get a front-row seat to nature’s most spectacular fashion show. Admire the luxuriant blond manes of golden snub-nose monkeys, stunning pink flamingo feathers brought on by an all-crustacean diet, and the meaningful markings of gemsboks and cheetahs.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - The Big Ones Ep8
programme.desc: Learn why bigger is definitely better for these alphas. Go ringside for a gorilla wrestling match, stay away from pushy moose antlers, steer clear of long pelican bills that snap at any enemy within range, and marvel at a megashark’s stereo sniffer.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Brought Back from the Brink Ep1
programme.desc: Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat’s teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - A Koala Called Cavendish Ep2
programme.desc: Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the team’s solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend who’s ready to fly.

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 - Life's Lessons Ep2
programme.desc: If young animals survive until adulthood, the chances for survival are greatly increased - but many challenges face them before they can strike out on their own. Some have months to grow-up; other have decades – but all, have lots to learn along the way. From getting to grips with their bodies and learning to feed themselves, to practicing fighting skills and learning how to form friendships. There are many hurdles along the way, but every small success could mean the difference between life and death.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Colors & Patterns Ep7
programme.desc: Get a front-row seat to nature’s most spectacular fashion show. Admire the luxuriant blond manes of golden snub-nose monkeys, stunning pink flamingo feathers brought on by an all-crustacean diet, and the meaningful markings of gemsboks and cheetahs.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - The Big Ones Ep8
programme.desc: Learn why bigger is definitely better for these alphas. Go ringside for a gorilla wrestling match, stay away from pushy moose antlers, steer clear of long pelican bills that snap at any enemy within range, and marvel at a megashark’s stereo sniffer.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 - Super Powers Ep2
programme.desc: See the animals that push the limits of physics, chemistry and engineering to pull off feats that humans can only dream of, and find out how evolution granted them with such amazing abilities. Sometimes it takes a super-power just to survive.

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: Trail Atlantic puffins, Prairie rattlesnakes, Alaskan caribou and other animals as they travel across the international boundary between the U.S. and Canada. See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - The Lost Boy Ep5
programme.desc: Film a wild dog hunt with Julz as he catches up with the Manzi pack at a kill, and watch for leopards and hyenas as the Kakuli pack takes great risks while waiting for the rains to come. Go on an epic hunt with a returning male of the Stork Colony.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Cradle of Mankind Ep5
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Family Ep1
programme.desc: Every empire needs a succession plan. Making babies – and raising them – is crucial for every species to survive. In some social circles, it takes a village to raise a family. In others, a single parent is all that stands between the vulnerability of youth and the threats of the wild.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Brought Back from the Brink Ep1
programme.desc: Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat’s teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - A Koala Called Cavendish Ep2
programme.desc: Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the team’s solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend who’s ready to fly.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 - Invisible World Ep3
programme.desc: Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we can’t see, sound we can’t hear and even stranger forces we can’t begin to detect.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Cradle of Mankind Ep5
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Here Comes the Rain Ep6
programme.desc: Welcome the rains as an emotional Julz says farewell to the dog packs. He discovers the Stork Colony pups hunting guinea fowl, and is heartened to find the Kakuli pups feeding on an antelope carcass. The playful Manzi pack corner a tough warthog.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Brought Back from the Brink Ep1
programme.desc: Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat’s teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Chemical Weapons Ep1
programme.desc: Keep your distance from these natural-born killers. Armed with venom and other poisonous tools that make hunting easier (and escape impossible), nudibranches, cuttlefish, giant centipedes, and assassin bugs are all dressed to kill.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Strange Powers Ep2
programme.desc: Examine the lives of creatures with really strange skills. From poison-shooting arachnids to ink-bombing octopuses to bifocal-eyed beetles, these animals use their powers to help them defeat predators and ensure their survival.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - Tidal Forest of Africa Ep1
programme.desc: We follow the South African mangrove forest and its residents through the change from high tide to low and back to high, meeting the red-claw mangrove crabs that keep the forest clean, helping it provide food and shelter for a variety of species.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Rebuilding an Empire Ep2
programme.desc: Over the course of recorded time, many species have been threatened with extinction. Once-powerful animal empires – like the dinosaurs - have been completely wiped from the planet. But others once on the verge of disappearance have survived, bounced back, and even reclaimed their kingdoms.

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 - Life's Legacies Ep3
programme.desc: For every species on earth the right to mate is the purpose of life. Passing on your genes to the next generation is every animal’s legacy. But it’s not easy, it can be a struggle to find a mate and then a fight to gain access. Only the strongest and most determined will win at Luangwa’s mating game.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Power Ep9
programme.desc: Power-up with alphas who use might to subdue enemies. Marvel when sea lions throw their weight around to win a mate, Cape buffalo deliver knockout punches, Canada geese hit hard with their wings, and lionesses rule the savannah with an iron paw.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Ugly Ep10
programme.desc: Confront alphas with faces only a mother could love. Inspect warthogs’ lumpy armour, giant African bullfrogs’ outsized jumping and biting skills, wild turkeys’ sharp beaks and razorlike spurs, and Nile crocodiles’ crushingly powerful jaws.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 - Super Powers Ep2
programme.desc: See the animals that push the limits of physics, chemistry and engineering to pull off feats that humans can only dream of, and find out how evolution granted them with such amazing abilities. Sometimes it takes a super-power just to survive.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - Defenders of the Reef Ep4
programme.desc: It’s summer in the Gulf of Oman. The scorching Arabian sun heats the shallow waters to 86 degrees boosting the growth of algae across a vast coral reef. This attracts thousands of hungry herbivores creating a fish versus fish turf war.

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: Get a front-row seat to the planet’s biggest biomass migration, the annual 1,000-mile sardine run along South Africa’s east coast. See billions of these tiny fish run a gauntlet of hungry predators, including stealthy seals and dive-bombing gannets.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - A Turtle's Legacy Ep5
programme.desc: The sea turtle is one of the oldest animals on earth. These ancient mariners even pre-date the dinosaurs. They have existed, relatively unchanged, for over 100 million years. But now, all seven of the surviving species are endangered.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Fogo Island Inn, Fogo Island, Newfoundland - Giles Coren and Monica Galetti experience the warm embrace of Fogo Island Inn on a rocky, sea-sprayed outpost of remote Fogo Island in Newfoundland.

programme.title: Grand Designs (S20) Ep1
programme.desc: In south Manchester, can Colin and Adele overcome contractor issues, delays and financial ruin to finish the build of their eye-popping curved glass home?

programme.title: My Unique B&B (S1) Ep14
programme.desc: Anthony and Bianca's Shed to Shepherd's Hut - Simon travels to Wiltshire to meet Anthony and Bianca who have grand plans to turn the shed at the bottom of their garden into a unique B&B. But those hopes are dashed when expert, Simon Parfett, says it's just too old and rickety to renovate.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall (S2) Ep14
programme.desc: In the town of Looe, Rick learns about a time when the Cornish were taken as slaves by North African pirates. He joins one of the last fishing boats in St Mawes and uses the catch of lemon sole to make a warm, delicious salad. In Newlyn, he meets two entrepreneur chefs who cook mackerel to perfection.

programme.title: Jamie's One-Pan Wonders (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Jamie whips up super-speedy smashed lemongrass chicken, flavour-packed sweet potato chilli with homemade nachos, and a chocolate party tray cake with tinned mandarins and buttercream.

programme.title: Jamie's One-Pan Wonders (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: Jamie cooks his take on shakshuka with asparagus, broccoli and harissa, and an outrageously good pulled pork that can be batched up and used in loads of meals whenever you need it.

programme.title: Nadiya's Food Adventure (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Peak District - In the Peak District and surrounding area Nadiya makes Derbyshire Oatcakes and turns them into samosas. She also creates pickles to use in a cod burger cooked in a busy food market.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Secret France (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Rick's journey begins in the Norman port of Dieppe with turbot straight off the boats, followed by a forage for sea herbs along the Bay of the Somme.

programme.desc: Donal and his trusty sheepdog Max venture to the East Coast of Ireland to the land of Crystal, Vikings (and dog yoga!) in County Waterford.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep43
programme.desc: That Sinking Feeling - When Masikura convinces King Julien that the island is sinking, Julien believes building an ark is the only way to save his people

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep44
programme.desc: The Jungle Rooster - When the Jungle Rooster keeps him up at night, Julien discovers that the Foosa have been farming chickens for food and risks his life to free them all

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep21
programme.desc: Savior - When all the other students at the Academy find out Cleo is the prophesied "Savior of the Galaxy," she worries they'll treat her differently. Then she worries they won't. Then there's this freaky bug lady.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep22
programme.desc: Pirates - It turns out the Space Pirates are so cool, you guys! Cleo, Akila and Brian get captured by them, but they're so cool it's almost hard to be mad at them, you know?

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep43
programme.desc: Lucky and the Escape Artist - Soon-to-be-big sister Lucky “borrows” Snips for a day to see what it’s like to have a little sibling, but nothing goes as planned

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep44
programme.desc: Lucky and the Thin Ice - The frontier gets a chill when Lucky, Spirit and the PALs attempt to rescue a missing girl

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep44
programme.desc: Worms Of Endearment / Dr Strangegrug Or How I Learned To Stop Worrying And Love The Spear - Lerk and Thunk hide all the valley's worms in a cave to protect them from the hunters who want to use them as bait; Grug invents the spear and pitches it to the Valley as a tool that will change cavemanity forever!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep45
programme.desc: Tunnel Of Terror / Creature From The Croods Lagoon - Eep, Thunk, Lerk, and Womp set out to make it to the end of “The Tunnel of Terror” within the Cave of Secrets; After being rescued by a mysterious creature at the watering hole, Thunk tries to convince the Valley that a “sea thing” exists and it's not just his imagination

programme.desc: The Beast of the Wasteland - Po and the Kids are once more waylaid, this time by Mole Rats who have deemed Bao their god. But when Bao isn't able to defeat the mythical creature plaguing the Wasteland, Fan Tong steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep27
programme.desc: Wormhole / Ear Worm - Following the events of the “Branch Bum,” the Trolls become lost in a series of wormholes, each of which leads to a new and strange alternate world. The Snack Pack must work together in order to find their way back home/In order to psych the Snack Pack up for collecting the confetti from Confetti-fest, DJ Suki unveils the catchiest song ever written. But when the song proves a little too catchy, Poppy will do anything to help get the song out of her friends’ heads.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep14
programme.desc: Show On The Road/Catherine The Great - Peabody and Sherman try to do the show in a new city but end up on the moon instead and must get home before astronauts take over the penthouse

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep14
programme.desc: Lucky And The Long Way Home - Spirit and Lucky desperately try to find a way back to one another.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep27
programme.desc: O Captain, My Captain Part 1 - Prince Barty and Princess Julienne, King Julien's needy and dramatic parents, must take over for their son when he's held captive on a pirate ship

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep14
programme.desc: Across The Universe - Team Voltron is left scattered with Shiro and Keith on a lava planet, Pidge stranded on a garbage nebula, and Coran and Allura trapped in a wormhole

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep14
programme.desc: Gran The Unfriendly Ghost / Bad Sandy - Gran is sick of the Croods not listening to her advice and fakes her own death. But, when the Croods don't mourn to her liking, she haunts them/Ahhh! Valley threatens to exile Sandy after a string of bad behavior unless the Croods can get her under control

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep14
programme.desc: Boy Boy Girl Band / Lords And Lazers - Tip and Oh try sneaking into a concert but almost destroy Human-Boov relations forever; K-Trong invites Tip and Oh to a make-believe game weekend.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep15
programme.desc: Tip's Deep Dish / Garbage Day - When Tip loses her voice, Oh finds a way to use his own voice to talk to her crush Keanu; Oh invents a way to redo yesterday so Tip can redeem a rotten day.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep4
programme.desc: African Queen / Mega Snails - The FAST crew is tricked into going to Africa by the Queen of the Banana Slugs for a dangerous journey through the plains in order to save her tribe. // White Shadow is challenged by three over-zealous and over-sized championship sumo wrestler snails to an outrageous wrestling match.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep37

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep7
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Zooming Zipwire - Ted and PC Selby are building a zipwire to run from Greendale Crag all the way down into the valley. The kids are on a hike, led by Lauren which is due to culminate at the zipwire – the only trouble is, it's not built yet! Pat and Jess have to race against time to deliver the huge steel cable to the top of the crag before the kids get there. All's going well until Pat hits bumpy ground and the cable rolls out of the back of the jeep and back down the hill! It takes the combined efforts of Pat, Ben, the SDS helicopter and some nifty map reading to rewind the uncoiled and hopelessly tangled cable and get it back up to Greendale Crag. Pat makes it just in time and the zipwire is a roaring success – even Pat and Jess have a go on it. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep8
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Super Jet Boots - Julian and the kids at Greendale School are excited about a Festival of flight - Ted's coming to talk about aviation and Alf's bringing Cedric the racing pigeon. Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!

programme.title: Olivia Ep11
programme.desc: Olivia And The Crystal Ball - While Olivia and her brothers play fortune teller, baby William accidentally breaks Dad's new bowling trophy, When a friendly police officer shows up at the door selling raffle tickets, Olivia is convinced that he's come for William, and she devises a scheme to keep William safe from the “arms of the law”.

programme.title: Olivia Ep12
programme.desc: Olivia Packs Up - Tired of having to share with her brother Ian, Olivia sets out on a trip around theblock in search of a place free from little brothers. She imagines herself crossing a vast desert by camel – which isn't all it's cracked up to be – and eventually decides that having a little brother might not be so bad after all.

programme.desc: Guilt Trip / Short cut - Ronnie Anne and her primos try to win Maria a trip around the world. // When Carlota fails at hair cutting, she trains with the master barber himself - CJ!

programme.desc: Skaters Gonna Hate / Born to Be Mild - Ronnie Anne and her pals enlist Carlos X as their coach in a skate-off against Tony Hawk! // Tired of the bullies at school, Alexis learns the tough guy ropes from Carl.

programme.desc: The Bros in the Band / For the Record - Bobby's dream of playing in a band might finally come true, but can he hang with Par's punk pals? // Worried he's not keeping up with his cool friends, Sameer tries to break a record for some street cred.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep174
programme.desc: Treats! / For Here or to Go - SpongeBob brings home a box of new snail treats that Gary will do anything to get – especially when they run out. // Plankton wins a free Krabby Patty, and Mr. Krabs will do anything to stop him from collecting.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep241
programme.desc: Squirrel Jelly / The String - SpongeBob and Patrick have their peaceful day of jelly fishing disturbed by Sandy's competitive nature. // SpongeBob pulls from Squidward's shirt a loose string that never seems to end.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep210
programme.desc: Life Insurance - After a misunderstanding, SpongeBob and Patrick try to prove their life insurance protects them from any danger!

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Yard Sale - GrandPat prevents his precious memories from being sold at a family yard sale.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Squidina's Little Helper / I Smell a Pat - The Patrick Star Show is interrupted by a most peculiar stench. // Squidina hires an assistant who's a little too good at his job.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Camp Crossbones / A Jelly Life - After SpongeBob, Patrick and Sandy are banned from playing pirate outside, they decide to turn their cabin into a pirate ship. // SpongeBob pretends to be a jellyfish for research purposes.

programme.title: The Smurfs S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Bringing Up Smurfy / The Makeover - When Dimwitty finds an egg in the woods, he and the other Smurfs put their parenting skills to the test. // Vanity wants to design a new outfit for the Smurfs but he and Tailor have different visions.

programme.title: The Smurfs S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Pluffs! - Blossom and Brainy are transported to an alternate universe where the Smurfs are grey and mean.

programme.desc: No Bones About It / Childish Antics - The mount has become a construction zone! Sammy and Raj need to find a way to fix this... // Sammy has his sights set on an Action Figure but it's 100 bucks! Luckily Malini has just the job for them...

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep135
programme.desc: Back to the Past / The Bad Guy Club for Villains - SpongeBob and Patrick go back in time to see the young Mermaidman and Barnacleboy. // SpongeBob and Patrick watch their heroes fight bad guys in a classic Mermaidman and Barnacleboy episode.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep102
programme.desc: BURT! The Musical / Sunday No FunDay - When Angus accidentally throws Burt away, he and Parker must get him back from Greenwood's Recycle King. // After Angus tells Parker and Russell to leave the house on his day off, Parker wrongly assumes it's permanent.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Hair Today, Gone Tomorrow / Dentist Trip - Parker finds a body hair, and the cloud assumes it's time to become an adult! // During a trip to the dentist, Parker remembers how the S.S. Steadfast got shipwrecked on Mt. Middlemost.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Trend Game / This Bird Has Flown - When Ronnie Anne realizes that she's not up to date on all of the latest trends, she seeks help from Carlota. // Bobby struggles to find Sergio after wishing he would fly away and never come back.

programme.desc: V.I.Peeved / Señor Class - Carlota worries that her family will embarrass her after her vlog is discovered by a famous musician. // Hector becomes Ronnie Anne and Carl's newest classmate after deciding to finish his schooling.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Maybe-Sitter - With the adults out for the night, Bobby and Carlota take turns watching the kids - and going to a party!

programme.desc: The Wahoo Punch Bro / Pink Rocket - When the Wahoo Punch Bro is running amok through Swellview, Captain Man & Kid Danger must find a way to stop him. // When Mitch Bilsky mocks Henry's kiddie motor scooter, Ray sets up race between Henry & Mitch to prove whose transportation is faster.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Snooze Pods / Sticky Vicky - Jasper becomes trapped in a dream using one of Schwoz's Snooze Pods. It's up to Captain Man & Kid Danger to bring him back. // Henry's field trip to the Museum of Celebrity Garbage is cut short by the arrival of Sticky Vicky.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep109
programme.desc: To Dad and Back / Survivoring - Patrick ventures inside Cecil to learn how the body works. // Cecil takes his kids camping, but Squidina wants the drama of reality TV.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep111
programme.desc: X Marks the Pot / Patrick's Alley - A classic villain returns to his former lair, only to find the Star Family inhabiting it. // The Patrick Show rebrands for a younger audience.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep120
programme.desc: No Hat for Pat / Toy Store Of Doom - Patrick is sick of all of his friends not being able to play with him because they have to put on their Krusty Krab hats and go to work. // A new toy store has opened up in Bikini Bottom, and SpongeBob and Patrick couldn't be happier!
